statements: SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT last_name, first_name, date_of_birth, blood_type FROM patient_records WHERE blood_type = 'O';
SELECT first_name AS 'Patient First Name', last_name AS 'Patient Last Name', medical_history FROM patient_records;
SELECT * FROM patient_records ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM patient_records ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patient_records WHERE blood_type = 'O+';
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM patient_records;
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_records WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM medical_history WHERE date_of_visit >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patient_records ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM patient_records JOIN medical_history ON patient_records.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE medical_history.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, date_of_visit FROM patient_records JOIN medical_history ON patient_records.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE date_of_visit BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT patient_name, address, diagnosis FROM patient_records JOIN medical_history ON patient_records.patient_id = medicaljson_statement_history.patient_id WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND diagnosis != 'Cold';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, prescription FROM MedicalHistory WHERE date_of_visit >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, phone_number FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender='M' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';

SELECT Patients.patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis, prescription FROM Patients JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY date_of_visit ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, phone_number FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_name;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalHistory.diagnosis, MedicalHistory.date_of_visit FROM Patients JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id WHERE MedicalHistory.date_of_visit BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM patient_records WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT * FROM medical_history WHERE doctor_name LIKE 'Dr.%';
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM prescription WHERE prescription_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01'
SELECT full_name, address FROM patient_records ORDER BY full_name ASC
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, treatment, doctor_name FROM medical_history WHERE date_of_visit = '2022-07-15'
SELECT * FROM prescription WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND prescription_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT doctor_id, specialty, hospital_name FROM doctor
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Doctors;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, treatment FROM MedicalHistory WHERE diagnosis='Cancer';
SELECT doctor_id, specialty FROM Doctors ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE status='Scheduled' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;

SELECT Patients.first_name, Doctors.specialty, Appointments.status FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id JOIN Doctors ON Appointments.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id;

SELECT Patients.first_name, Prescriptions.medication_name, Prescriptions.dosage FROM Patients JOIN Prescriptions ON Patients.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id WHERE Prescriptions.dosage LIKE '%mg';

SELECT Doctors.first_name, MedicalHistory.diagnosis, MedicalHistory.date FROM Doctors JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id JOIN MedicalHistory ON Appointments.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id;
